title: PANDA3D_physics_collision_shapes node extension
description: Collision shape information for a node

shapes.description: Collision shape information to represent the node

groups.description: A 32-bit bit field representing the node's group membership

masks.description: A 32-bit bit field representing what groups the node can collide with

intangible.description: Whether or not collision responses should be generated instead of just registered for this node
